properties.areaDesc: Waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR from 10 to 60 nm; Coastal waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR out 10 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued March 2 at 2:30PM PST until March 5 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Steep combined northwest seas 9 to 12 ft expected.

* WHERE...The entire area will be affected.

* WHEN...From 10 AM Tuesday to 10 AM PST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds and/or steep seas could capsize or
damage smaller vessels.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should remain in port and avoid the area of hazardous
conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TUESDAY TO 10 AM PST THURSDAY
